content:
Add a requirement that the rewritten paragraph must also include a description of the athlete's background and accomplishments leading up to their Olympic gold medal win.
#The Given Prompt#:
Edit the paragraph by changing the verb tenses of the verbs in the paragraph to the past tense.
People are cheering when the Olympic gold medalist takes the stage. They wave the flags and celebrate the victory.
#Rewritten Prompt#:
In addition to changing the verb tenses of the given prompt to past tense, add a requirement to include a brief summary of the athlete's training regimen and any previous competitions they participated in leading up to their Olympic gold medal win.

#Rewritten Paragraph with Additional Requirement#:

People cheered when the Olympic gold medalist took the stage. They waved the flags and celebrated the victory. Before reaching this monumental achievement, the athlete had dedicated years to rigorous training. Their daily regimen included early morning runs, intensive strength training, and meticulous skill practice. This dedication was evident in their previous victories at national championships and their impressive performance in international competitions, setting the stage for their triumphant Olympic gold medal win.
